description: Problem classifications for an Azure service.

commands.name: az support services problem-classifications list
commands.summary: List all the problem classifications (categories) available for a specific Azure service. Always use the service and problem classifications obtained programmatically. This practice ensures that you always have the most recent set of service and problem classification Ids.

commands.name: az support services problem-classifications show
commands.summary: Get problem classification details for a specific Azure service.
